title: A system for the emergency management in energy network control rooms
segmentation: So after a lot of very interesting and technical papers, we will talk about human computer interaction and.
Humor.
Machine interactions, so just an overview of these.

Of this project, this paper presents a realization of communication strategies for the operators of the Energy Network Control Room of Hearing Group that have some like some problems in their interaction and this.
This project is carried out within an Artemis European funded project that is named Holidays.
And as everybody knows, control rooms are really a mess with.
Phone ringing people speaking giving instruction to users.
Alot of monitors with a lot of information to be monitored.
Alot of information to be recapped and retrived and also if the coordination of their own field technicians becausw whenever function is detected.
The operator of the control room as to give the task to their own fields technician calling him.
Asking him where he is, if he is engaged or not.
If it is heibel he has the skills to solve the malfunction and so on, and we performed the study in order to improve the communication strategies and to reduce the time spent in a phone.
Calling technician on fields and control room operators.
So what are the problems that comes come out?
We have a very time consuming process that and the third day malfunctions management from the user that calls and refers about the about the malfunction to the technician field.
That's all fit the location of task is an inefficient cause the control room operators as to retrieve in his memory.
Who is the technician that is best sweater that has the.
More suitable skills to solve their malfunction and there is an absence of any system able to share in automatic way coordinated collect all the relevant information about work shifts, for example.
Engagement of technicians skills, previous experience, geographic location and so.

So to cover this Lex in the control room communication strategy and added cost system and adaptive cooperative human machine system has been designed for collecting and managing information in order to distribute automatically the tasks to the technician.
According to a set of configure, our criteria that can choose the operator of the control room can choose.

Providing available dot on the field to technicians and providing both the operators and and the technician or filled with historical records concerning the relevant infrastructure data usually are stored in the memory of the operators.
The cost design refers could so to the control theory where system can be modeled as iterated component that maintain the system stability by feedback loops of information.
Control so we have any human supervisory control in the control room by the control.
Operate the control room operator.
Then we have an automatic control that is able to allocate tasks when users communicating malfunction.
Then we have the list of available technicians, so the automatic control is able to match.
This needs to allocate tasks and then to ask to the human supervisor the final approvement.
So this is the environment of the energy control network.

Aware there is a dialer, the user that refers about malfunction, that is, a software that is called Genesis that dispatches the call to the proper authorities center according to the type of malfunction.
Gas, electricity, water and whatever there is the call center operator that insert manually all the information about who, where, what is happened.
In another software and then there are a lot of radio calls or phone calls in order to allocate the task.
This is the actual situation.

What are the problems so that we have a lot of information to be monitored so we have on the side of the condition of field shift or rotation night and oliday shifts, working time, skills, geographic area seniors for intervention cause each technician is responsible for different geographic areas and if it is currently engaged.
And then we have the malfunction features to be monitored type, where historical data, for example, is the first time that the malfunction happens the second time, and so on.
And what are in another perspective, the factors that making monitoring very difficult in the control room.

The for example, the problem to verify shifted working times be cause they had the Excel sheets with the shifts of every technician that every morning will be printed and consulted looking to the monitors.
Look into the papers and then to be aware of the request as keys to solve their malfunction.
For example disease and ability of the control room operator that knows or maybe.
Doesn't know if a technician is able or not able to solve a malfunction to be aware of the current commitment.
So if the technician is engaged in another activity or not, and to verify if a type of malfunction occurred in the past in order two may be allocated to the same technician, for example.
So what we decided to create first of all, we need a database to collect all this information that are usually on the paper or in the memory of the operators then.
An Android application to his.
The communication between the control room operator and the technician on fields and the room based inginer that is able to allocate the tasks to the best suitable technician.
About the human machine interface, this is the first graphic layout that has been tested in a during a focus group with control room operators.
That let the operator to know who are the available technician and if it is possible to assign them a task or not.
On the other side there on field technician as to accept or reject the.
The task assignment, and if he accepts, he can download all the needed data about the malfunction for the on field technician.
The graphical user interfaces should be very very simple with few big icons be cause we have to remember that usually are people that have big growth that handle with screwdrivers.
Mars crews and so on so they cannot interact with a very refined application or with a small icons to be touched and so on.
So.
This is.
The communication strategies that we set up with this project.
As I said before, we already tested this graphing and this processor with the Android application with a focus group and then we will attest with a Petri net network simulation out.
The application is able to allocate.
Tasks in case of emergency, let's think about Floding Aurora.
Big weather big weather events in which, for example there are alot alot of electricity problem or water problems.
So we have to test if this application is able to allocate with success or the task to the available technician.
